answers.answer: I had gestational diabetes with my first child and she was 7lbs 3oz, I'm 31 weeks along with my second child and diabetic again but, an ultrasound yesterday had my baby weighing in at just under 4 pounds so, that's right on track for an average size baby. Having gestational diabetes does not necessarily mean you will have a large baby. As long as you are trying to keep your numbers down and have a supportive doctor, you should be fine.
my sister had GD and my niece was 9lb.. (c section odv.)
I had gestational diabetes with my first she was 5 lbs 12oz
My sis in law had it as well and she had to take pills and her son was 6 lbs 14oz

question: If you were positive for gestational diabetes how big were your babies at birth?
title: ladies!
